subject: Coaches and Managers
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets coaches are clearly on notice: Management is willing to give them a chance while the Mets are at home against the Cardinals and the Diamondbacks, but things must improve.
snippet: The Mets coaches are clearly on notice: Management is willing to give them a chance while the Mets are at home against the Cardinals and the Diamondbacks, but things must improve.
